#include<iostream>
using namespace std ;
long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
   long long int c =a%b;
  while(c != 0)
  {
    a = b;
    b = c;
    c = a % b;
  }
  return b;
}
int main()
{
long long int T ,RCUT ,mnsz,mnr_fctr,size,r_fctr,N,ACUT ,div,p,q;
cin>>T ;
while(T--)
{
cin>>N ;
cin>>mnsz ;
cin>>mnr_fctr ;
RCUT=0 ;
div=1 ;
for(long long int i=0;i<N;i++)
{
cin>>size ;
cin>>r_fctr ;
if(size>mnsz || r_fctr>mnr_fctr)
RCUT++ ;
}
cin>>ACUT ; 
if(RCUT==0 )
{
cout<<"0/1"<<endl ;
continue ;
}
div=gcd(RCUT,ACUT) ;
p=RCUT/div ;
q=ACUT/div ;
cout<<p<<"/"<<q<<endl ;
}
//getch()  ;
return 0 ;
}
